text.title: University of Utah study finds suicide may be linked to air pollution
text.head: University of Utah study finds suicide may be linked to air pollution
Sources

list.item: Traci Pedersen. "Polluted Air Tied to Hike in Suicide Risk" — Psych Central , February 14, 2015
Honor Whiteman. "Air pollution linked to increased risk of suicide" — Medical News Today , February 13, 2015

text.head: External links

list.item: Amanda V. Bakian, Rebekah S. Huber, Hilary Coon, Douglas Gray, Phillip Wilson, William M. McMahon, and Perry F. Renshaw. "Acute Air Pollution Exposure and Risk of Suicide Completion" — American Journal of Epidemiology , February 10, 2015
